text: He nabi! Tumi tomara straisakalaka, tomara jiyaraisakalaka arau muminasakalara straisakalaka koraa, te'omloke yena te'omlokara cadarara kichu ansa nijara oparata tani laya. E'ito te'omlokaka cinara sahaja upaya, phalata te'omlokaka birakta karaa naha'ba. Allaha parama ksamasila, parama dayalu
